title: Difference between Authorization and Authentication
ans: Authentication is the process of verifying someone and Authorization is the process of verifying a specific application.

title: Why are you using firebase?
ans: Provides backend services for user authentication, easy-to-use and ready-made UI library so users, I have Bit, Auth0 to implement authentication

title: What other services does firebase provide other than authentication
ans: Firebase provides Hosting services other than Authentication
